name: Website Redesign
description: Revamping the company's website to improve user experience and modernize the design.

tasks.name: Gather Requirements
tasks.description: Collect feedback from stakeholders and users to define key features.

tasks.name: Design Wireframes
tasks.description: Create initial wireframe layouts for main pages.

tasks.name: Develop Frontend
tasks.description: Implement the UI based on approved designs using React.

name: Marketing Campaign
description: Launching a social media and email marketing campaign to increase brand awareness.

tasks.name: Define Target Audience
tasks.description: Analyze customer data to identify target demographics.

tasks.name: Create Content Plan
tasks.description: Draft a content calendar for posts and email newsletters.

tasks.name: Launch Campaign
tasks.description: Run social media ads and send out email sequences.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Building a cross-platform mobile application for tracking fitness activities.

tasks.name: Research Competitors
tasks.description: Analyze existing fitness apps to identify key features and gaps.

tasks.name: Develop Backend API
tasks.description: Set up a Node.js backend with authentication and data storage.

tasks.name: Implement Workout Tracking
tasks.description: Develop and test the activity tracking feature.

name: Cybersecurity Audit
description: Conducting a security audit of company systems and implementing necessary improvements.

tasks.name: Identify Vulnerabilities
tasks.description: Perform penetration testing to find security gaps.

tasks.name: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
tasks.description: Enhance security by adding two-factor authentication.
